messages.subject: Barbie sheets
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/17/2004 4:11:35 PM Eastern Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: So show him how to take the good of our society and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/17/2004 4:11:35 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
So show him how to take the good of our society and disregard the bad. Not
by refusing to get Barbie sheets (or whatever) for him if he wants
them.....but by living YOUR life according to your convictions.
That's right, so if your convictions say don't buy those Barbie sheets,
don't. If you buy them, then your not living YOUR life. If he wants them, he can
save his money and by them himself. Then you can both live your own lives by
your own convictions.

I bought character sheets for my daughters once, they were crap, I didn't buy
them again.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
